title: [NOVA 2025](https://novaparty.org/) releases
content: - Retro32's ANSI compo winner: [The goggles, they do nothing](collyviewer.html?collyname=retro32-ansi.ans&font=80x25) *(Well done Karl!)*

- FuZioN's magnum opus of an ASCII release Textual Boogaloo: [compo version](collyviewer.html?collyname=fzn-tboo-nova25.txt) and [final release](collyviewer.html?collyname=fzn-tboo.txt) *(Your poor keyboard Darren!)*

title: Party time!
content: Added some missing party results to the site and tidied up the menu ordering.
